content.rendered:
beauty bar in hamilton | THE TEN SPOT®

welcome to 10spot® beauty bar in hamilton, ontario. our team is full of skilled experts who know how to make you look and feel your best! we offer a variety of services like waxing, facials, nail care, and laser hair removal. when you visit us, our awesome team will set you on track to taking the steps to feeling #LikeATen®

book now!

buy a membership

Print directions
beauty bar in hamilton | THE TEN SPOT®
  • 146 james st. n. hamilton, ontario
  • 289-309-1010
  • hamilton@thetenspot.com

Hours

mon.: closed

tue. - sat: 10:00 am – 6:00 pm

sun.: closed

our beauty bar services

nails

we offer the best mani pedi in town! we offer nail extensions, gel nails, pedicures, and many more.

See services menu

waxing

we offer top notch waxing services designed to make you #feellikeaten like our brazilly®, thongkini®, general full body waxing, and much more.

See services menu

facials

our team has serious skills when it comes to facial treatments. we offer stress-free facial procedures like anti-aging facials, dermaplaning, chemical peels, and many more.

See services menu

brows

what better way to spoil yourself than by getting your brows and lashes done. wether you’re looking for lash lifts, brow lams, or more, we do it all.

See services menu

laser

hair removal can be tricky, thats why we make it simple with our awesome lineup of laser hair removal treatments like our bikini laser, full body laser, and much more.

See services menu
book now at this location

Check out our awesome reviews!

I came here because my cuticles were in need of TLC. I had a delightful experience with Laura who did my quickie mani/pedi. The vibes were immaculate - clean, bright, welcoming, relaxing. I was able to find parking a short walk away (& it’s free on... Sundays - bonus!). Laura was very gentle and was able to hold lovely conversation while also leaving room for comfortable silence. There was a great cooking show on TV and chill music playing in the background. Overall the perfect experience and I will definitely return 🙂read more
Jazzlyn MacDonald
1721600146
Welcoming staff, terrific esthetician who listened and gave me a first class manipedi. On the negative side many nail polishes were past prime, separated, thick but I found one that did work. Wish there was a combined manipedi price. I’ll be back... for sure.read more
Marilyn Renwick
1720222991
Charlie was amazing - not only did I get a beautiful gel mani but felt like it doubled as a comedy show. I was tearing up from laughing. By far - best experience at a nail salon ever. The space is clean and welcoming and is free from that chemical... smell you usually run into in these types of spaces. I love it here :’)read more
Krys Xuereb
1719613535
Charlie is amazing! it was my first time seeing her and at this location in general but she made it seem like we’ve known each other for years. 10/10 would recommend
Katelynn Valenzuela
1718992399
This place is amazing, incredible service very kind staff very welcoming, also very much comforting staff as well, this place knows how to wax and make sure the area u are wax has no hair. Also very hospitable ,I will be continuing to come here for... waxing services :)✨✨🤌🏽read more
Isabella Thompson
1715790803
I really enjoy this location. It is bright, warm, and the employees are kind and professional.It's easy to spend all your money here and not feel like a cent was wasted.Thank you for your care.
Rebecca Belforte
1709947497
Had my first ever Brazilian wax - was extremely nervous, but my nerves were relieved as soon as my appointment started. Will definitely be a regular customer, and big shout out to Leah who was very kind and patient.
kim parker
1705164147
Two things…got a great pedi, she did a great job on some challenging feet! Secondly, I was impressed by the respectful and professional manner in which a staff member handled a challenging phone call. All round…a great experience.
G&B Smith
1704229244
Love this location so much! All the staff are great and it’s always clean, consistent experience every time. Claire is so nice and organized, and Gabby does amazing nail art! I’ve been going for two years and won’t get my nails done anywhere else.
Melissa DeVries
1701607569
I’ve been coming here for the last year and have nothing but good things to say about this place. Everyone there is so friendly and Charlie specifically is always a pleasure to see. I had never had a wax when I first started coming and she always... makes the experience as comfortable and painless as possible. 100/10 experience always!!!read more
Rachael Surla
1699993082
I absolutely love this place! I’ve been coming for years and will continue to do so despite moving far away from Hamilton. I’d gladly travel for hours to receive the stellar service that Charlie provides. She’s always so friendly, personable, and... accommodating. She has an infectious smile and a great sense of humour! I wholeheartedly recommend this place!read more
Lauren Abbott
1699725831
Charlie is always spectacular! She helped me find the perfect chocolate shade for my fingernails.I love this place
Samantha Suarez
1699555978
I have been going to Ten Spot for 5 years now and have gone for pedicures, wax and laser hair removal! I always have a pleasant experience with everyone there. A special shout out to Charlie for always keeping track of what I have been up to and... remembering details to ask me about next time I’m in. She’s very personable and turns what could feel like an awkward interaction in to a warm, inviting and enjoyable experience. Given that some treatments can create pain, I never feel that way or notice because of her attention to keeping up conversation and making the treatment as comfortable as possible! 10 stars Charlie !read more
Candice Petrovic
1699408676
‹
›
